item.description:
IFF Meetup Planner

Welcome to the Boston International/Arthouse movie groups Independent Film Festival meetup planner, designed by Jim Lerner. Using this tool, you can see who else in the group will be attending each film and make plans to get together to watch the film and discuss it.

Each day of the 2009 festival is shown on a separate tab, which you can select from the links at the bottom of the screen. Enter your name in the first column and add an "X" under each movie you intend to watch. If there's a meetup planned, you can see the place and time under the name of the movie. If it's blank, go ahead and start a meetup!

Most of the films are shown at the Somerville Theatre in Davis Square. Those that aren't indicate the theatre name following the title.


IFF Meetup Planner
item.name: Meetup Planner for the Independent Film Festival
